column4: Text only is specified as part of an Assessment Personal Needs Profile to define the type of material that should be rendered using the read aloud alternative content.
Text and graphics is specified as part of an Assessment Personal Needs Profile to define the type of material that should be rendered using the read aloud alternative content.
Graphics only is specified as part of an Assessment Personal Needs Profile to define the type of material that should be rendered using the read aloud alternative content.
Non-visual is specified as part of an Assessment Personal Needs Profile to define the type of material that should be rendered using the read aloud alternative content.
